item.title: AG showdown: DC attorney general rejects US Attorney General Pam Bondi order as 'unlawful'
item.description: Washington D.C. Attorney General Brian Schwalb declared that in his view, an order issued by U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi "is unlawful"

item.title: Trump to hold historic summit with Putin in Alaska seeking an end to Russia–Ukraine war
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin for a historic summit Friday in Alaska.

item.title: AG Bondi strips power from DC police chief, rescinds sanctuary city protections in crime crackdown operation
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi issued an order rescinding sanctuary city policies in Washington, D.C. and naming an "emergency police commissioner."

item.title: Judge orders RFK Jr's HHS to stop sharing Medicaid data with immigration officials
item.description: A federal judge ordered the Department of Health and Human Services to stop providing access to Medicaid enrollees' personal data to immigration offic...

item.title: ‘Defend the Homeland’: DHS unveils striking new ICE fleet to boost recruitment, visibility
item.description: DHS unveiled a fleet of newly branded ICE vehicles in Washington, D.C., as part of a recruitment push during heightened federal law enforcement activi...
